What it is: Identifies the protective purpose behind self-destructive behavior.
How to use it: Describe a pattern of sabotage. Ask AI to trace its origin and purpose.

What it is: Breaks desires into symbolic, emotional, and identity-based layers.
How to use it: Name something you want. Ask AI to break down what each layer of that desire is actually aiming to fulfill.
What it changes: Improves desire literacy and choice alignment.

What it is: Compiles and analyzes moments where your boundaries were crossed.
How to use it: List major moments of personal boundary violation. Ask AI to identify patterns and hidden lessons.

What it is: Examines your attachment style through relational micro-narratives.
How to use it: Describe a few emotionally intense relationships. Ask AI to identify core attachment scripts playing out.
What it changes: Clarifies attachment logic and enhances secure relating.

What it is: Tracks the little yesses that accumulate into life direction.
How to use it: List recent choices that felt minor. Ask AI how they aggregate into trajectory.
What it changes: Improves micro-decision consciousness and life path control.

What it is: Identifies behavior loops formed in the aftermath of trauma.
How to use it: Describe your behavior after a trauma. Ask AI to show how it reshaped your coping logic.
What it changes: Exposes trauma adaptations and invites post-traumatic growth.

What it is: Audits what image you're unconsciously projecting.
How to use it: List your communication habits. Ask AI to identify what brand or impression they build.

What it is: Detects if your goals are rooted in old emotional wounds.
How to use it: Describe a major ambition. Ask AI to scan for signs it was shaped by insecurity, shame, or rebellion.
What it changes: Purifies ambition and reorients toward intrinsic aims.

What it is: Tests if your self-story is chronologically and emotionally integrated.
How to use it: Describe your life phases. Ask AI to detect inconsistencies or fragmentation.
What it changes: Improves internal narrative and psychological congruence.

What it is: Locates where you are psychologically on your lifeâ€™s existential map.
How to use it: Describe your current mindset. Ask AI to place you on a map of meaning, loss, seeking, or transcendence.
What it changes: Grants meta-context and guides existential orientation.
